item.title: By: Jonathan Shock
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Shock
item.description:
Hi there, yes, indeed that should have been (3,0). Thank you for that.
J
item.content:encoded:
Hi there, yes, indeed that should have been (3,0). Thank you for that.

J

item.title: By: Nikheil
item.dc:creator: Nikheil
item.description: Why is it that (2,-1) which gives us a gradient of 1 take us to (2,0)? Why is it not (3,0)? a slope of one does not take us vertically up.
item.content:encoded: Why is it that (2,-1) which gives us a gradient of 1 take us to (2,0)? Why is it not (3,0)? a slope of one does not take us vertically up.
